verbose_text: To investigate the function of the cytoophidium in mammalian cells, 293T cells were transfected with a construct of mouse CTP synthase 1-GFP fusion protein (mCTPsyn1-GFP) which is driven by the EF1alpha promoter.
evidence: CTP synthase 1-GFP fusion protein (mCTPsyn1-GFP) which is driven by the EF1alpha promoter
